GSP31tattvmiu:3: ato bhavati duḥkhābhighātake jijñāsā sā ca tattvajñānāt /
GSP31tattvmiu:15: akke cenmadhu vindeta kimarthaṃ parvataṃ vrajet /
GSP31tattvmiu:16: iṣṭasyārthasya saṃprāptau ko vidvān yatnamācaret // iti /
GSP31tattvmiu:21: yadyapi śāstrīyamapi ahorātramāsavarṣādisādhyamupāyāntaraṃ sukaraṃ śrūyate apāma somamamṛtā abhūmeti tathāpi etadapi laukikopāyatulyameva /
GSP31tattvmiu:23: akṛte hi tadvadhaprāyaścitte svargādigatyanantaraṃ paripacyate eva tadduḥkham /
GSP31tattvmiu:24: na ca na hiṃsyātsarvābhūtānīti sāmānyaśāstrabhya viśeṣaśāstreṇāgnīṣomīyaṃ paśumālabhetetyanena
GSP31tattvmiu:25: bādhaḥ śaṅkyaḥ bhinnaviṣayatvena bādhyabādhakabhāvāsambhavāt agnīṣomīyaṃ paśumālabheteti
GSP31tattvmiu:26: vākyena hi vadhasya kratūpakārakatvameva bodhyate na tu puruṣapratyavāyābhāvaḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:29: na karmaṇā na prajayā dhanena tyāgenaikenāmṛtatvamānaśuḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:30: pareṇa nākaṃ nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ vibhrājate yadyatayo viśanti //
GSP31tattvmiu:31: karmaṇā jyotiṣṭomādinā prajayā putreṇa dhanena devatājñānena putreṇāyaṃ loko jeyo
GSP31tattvmiu:32: vidyayā devalokaḥ karmaṇā pitṛloka iti śrutyantarāt ebhiḥ pitrādilokasyaiva prāptirnāmṛtatvasyeti bhāvaha /
GSP31tattvmiu:35: tadamṛtatvaṃ svarga eva cettattrāha pareṇa nākamiti /
GSP31tattvmiu:36: tarhi dūrasthatvānna prāpyamiti cettatrāha nihitaṃ guhāyāmiti /
GSP31tattvmiu:37: taccāsannatvātpṛthak janairapi labhyamiti cettatrāha yadyataya iti /
GSP31tattvmiu:41: tathā 'pare ṛṣayo ye manīṣiṇaḥ paraṃ karmabhyo 'mṛtatvamānaśuriti //
GSP31tattvmiu:43: yadāhuḥ ābhūtasamplavaṃ sthānamamṛtatvaṃ hi bhāṣyate iti /
GSP31tattvmiu:48: vyaktasya kāryajātasya tatkāraṇasya avyaktasya pradhānasya tābhyāṃ parasya tasyātmanaśca vivekena jñānādbhavati iti /
GSP31tattvmiu:53: tatra jagato mūlakāraṇabhūtaṃ pradhānaṃ na vikāraḥ kintu prakṛtireva prakarotīti prakṛtiḥ sattvarajastamasāṃ sāmyāvasthā /
GSP31tattvmiu:56: etadevāvyaktaṃ sattvādīnāṃ guṇānāṃ vaiṣamye sati vyaktamityucyate /
GSP31tattvmiu:59: tatra prakṛtivikāreṣu madhye ādyo vikāro mahānityucyate sa etadbuddhilakṣaṇaḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:64: ayaṃ hi kramaḥ prakṛtermahān mahato 'haṅkāraṃ ahaṅkārātpañca tanmātrāḥ tābhyaḥ pañca
GSP31tattvmiu:65: bhūtāni tanmātrāṇi punaḥ kṣīradadhyorantarāle kalalapariṇāmātpariṇatāni sūkṣmabhūtāni
GSP31tattvmiu:68: pañca bhūtāni ekādaśendriyāṇi ceti eṣa ṣoḍaśako gaṇastu vikāra eva na prakṛtiḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:72: ṣoḍaśakastu vikāro na prakṛtirna vikṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ // iti /
GSP31tattvmiu:75: ārṣaṃ tu vijñānaṃ yogināmeveti tadatra noktam /
GSP31tattvmiu:77: tanmātralakṣaṇāstu devānāṃ yogināṃ ca viṣayā na tvasmadādīnām teṣāṃ cendriyaiḥ sambandhaḥ sannikarṣaḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:78: evañca viṣayasambaddhendriyāśrito yo buddhidharmo 'dhyavasāyaḥ sa eva pramāṇam /
GSP31tattvmiu:80: viṣayasambaddhānāmindriyāṇāṃ vṛttau satyāṃ buddhestu tamobhibhave sati yaḥ sattvasamudrekaḥ so 'dhyavasāya iti jñānamiti vṛttiścākhyāyate /
GSP31tattvmiu:87: jñānasukhādimāniva bhavati citisādṛśyaprāptyā ca acetanāpi buddhistadavadhyavasāyaśca
GSP31tattvmiu:91: nahi puruṣāntaragataḥ saṃśayaḥ anumānaṃ kathanaṃ vinā vā jñātuṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:93: tathāhi upamānaṃ tāvat gosadṛśo gavaya iti vākyaṃ tajjanito bodho śabda evāntarbhavati cakṣuḥsaṃnikṛṣṭasya gavayasya yat gosādṛśyajñānaṃ tatpratyakṣameva
GSP31tattvmiu:94: evaṃ jīvataścaitrasya gṛhāsattvena bahiḥsattvakalpanamarthāpattiḥ sāpyanumāna evāntarbhavati /
GSP31tattvmiu:96: yadā tvavyāpakaḥ sannekatrāsti tadānyatra nāsti yadaikatra nāsti tadānyatrāstīti vyāptigrahāt /
GSP31tattvmiu:97: evamiha vaṭe yakṣaḥ prativasati iti aitihyaṃ na pramāṇamanirdiṣṭasvavaktṛkatvena sandehāt /
GSP31tattvmiu:100: na hi bhūtalasya kaivalyalakṣaṇātpariṇāmaviśeṣādanyo ghaṭābhāvo nāma /
GSP31tattvmiu:101: sarva eva hi bhāvāḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ pariṇāminaḥ sa ca pariṇāmabheda aindriyaka evetyalam /
GSP31tattvmiu:104: asato hi sattvaṃ duṣkaram nahi nīlaṃ śilpisahasreṇāpi pītaṃ śakyaṃ kartum /
GSP31tattvmiu:105: kintu tileṣu pīḍanena tailasyeva āvirbhāvamātramutpattiḥ tirobhāva eva vināśaḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:106: kiñcāsambaddhasyāpi kāryasya janyatve sambaddhatvāviśeṣātsarvaṃ kāryaṃ sarvasmādbhavediti kāryasambaddhasyaiva kāraṇasya janakatvamupeyam /
GSP31tattvmiu:108: kiñca tantudharmatvāttantūpādeyatvācca na paṭasyārthāntaratvam yannaivaṃ tannaivaṃ yathā ghaṭapaṭau /
GSP31tattvmiu:109: tathā arthāntarayoḥ saṃyogo vā bhavati yathā kuṃḍabadarayoḥ aprāptirvā bhavati himavadvindhyayoḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:110: tasmādyathā kūrmaśarīre kūrmāṅgāni niviśamānāni tirobhavanti na tatra tānyutpadyante na vinaśyanti vā evamekasmātsuvarṇādermukuṭādiprādurbhāva evotpattiḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:111: evañca mahadādikāryaṃ pradhāne 'bhiniviśate avyaktaṃ bhavati iti /
GSP31tattvmiu:112: kāraṇe sattyeva kāryasya vibhāgāvibhāgābhyāmavyaktaṃ kāraṇamastīti gamyate /
GSP31tattvmiu:113: taccāvyaktaṃ nityaṃ vyāpakaṃ ca sarvaṃ kāryaṃ vyāpnoti tathā niḥkriyaṃ kvacidapyanāśritañca evaṃ niravayavaṃ svatantraṃ ca /
GSP31tattvmiu:115: evaṃ vyaktamavyaktaṃ ca sukhaduḥkhamoharūpaguṇatrayānvitamacetanaṃ prasavadharmi ca tadviparītaḥ puruṣaḥ sukhādayaśca guṇāḥ sattvarajastamorūpāḥ
GSP31tattvmiu:116: sattvasya prayojanaṃ tu prakāśaḥ rajastu tasya pravartakaṃ tamastu niyāmakaṃ yadi hi tamasā guruṇā niyamyeta tadā rajaḥ laghu sattvaṃ sarvatra pravarttayet /
GSP31tattvmiu:117: yathā sattvaṃ rajastamasī abhibhūya śāntā vṛttimadhigacchati yathā ca rajaḥ sattvarajasī abhibhūya ghorāṃ tathā tamaḥ sattvarajasī abhibhūya mūḍhāmiti /
GSP31tattvmiu:118: yadyapyete parasparaṃ virodhaśīlāḥ tathāpi yathā vātapittaśleṣmāṇaḥ parasparavirodhinaḥ śarīradhāraṇarūpaikakāryakāriṇaḥ evamete 'pi /
GSP31tattvmiu:119: evaṃ sukhahetutvātsattvaṃ sukhātmakaṃ duḥkhahetutvādduḥkhātmakaṃ rajaḥ yanmohakaṃ tattamaḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:120: te ca sukhaduḥkhamohāḥ parasparavirodhinaḥ svānurūpāṇyeva parasparaṃ viruddhāni sukhaduḥkhamohātmakāni nimittāni kalpayanti /
GSP31tattvmiu:121: tathāhi ekaiva strī svāminaṃ prati sukharūpasadbhāvāttaṃ sukhākaroti sapatnīstu duḥkhākaroti evamatrāpyekasyāpi nimittabhedādbhedaḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:123: sargādau tu pariṇāmasvabhāvā guṇāḥ kṣaṇamapyapariṇamayya na tiṣṭhantīti sattvaṃ sattvarūpatayā rajo rajorūpatayā tamastamorūpatayā pravarttate
GSP31tattvmiu:124: yathāhi ghanavimuktajalānāṃ jambīrakaravīranārikerādyāśrayabhedādasti bhedaḥ evamekarūpāṇāmapi guṇānāṃ pratiguṇāśrayaviśeṣādanekarūpatā /
GSP31tattvmiu:128: kiñca yathā rathādi yaṃtryādinādhiṣṭhitaṃ evaṃ triguṇātmakamapi pareṇa kenacidadhiṣṭhīyamānaṃ yuktam /
GSP31tattvmiu:129: sa cātmā pratiśarīraṃ bhinnaḥ na hyekasmin sukhini sarve sukhinaḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:130: sa cāyaṃ puruṣaḥ sākṣī ca bhavati prakṛtirhi svaviṣayacaritaṃ puruṣāya pradarśayati /
GSP31tattvmiu:131: tathāhi loke arthipratyarthinau vivādaviṣayaṃ sākṣiṇe darśayataḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:135: ata evātriguṇatvānmadhyastho 'pi bhavati sukhī hi sukhe tṛpyan duḥkhī dviṣan madhyastho na bhavati /
GSP31tattvmiu:138: yadyapi cetano 'haṃ karomīti kṛticaitanyayoraikādhikaraṇyaṃ pratīyate tathāpi puruṣapradhānādisambandhātpuruṣacaitanyamavyakte guṇakartṛtvaṃ ca puruṣe upacaryate /
GSP31tattvmiu:139: bhogyaṃ hi pradhānaṃ bhoktāramantareṇa na saṃbhavati iti bhavati tasya bhoktrapekṣā
GSP31tattvmiu:140: puruṣastu bhogyena pradhānena saṃyuktastadgataṃ duḥkhamātmanyabhimanyamānaḥ kaivalyaṃ prārthayate /
GSP31tattvmiu:141: tacca sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātinibandhanam na ca sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātiḥ pradhānamantareṇeti
GSP31tattvmiu:142: kaivalyārthaṃ puruṣaḥ pradhānamapekṣata iti tayoḥ saṃyogaḥ ata eva saṃyogo na mahadādisargamantareṇa
GSP31tattvmiu:143: bhogāya kaivalyāya ca paryāpta iti saṃyoga eva bhogāpavargārthaṃ sargaṃ karotīti //
GSP31tattvmiu:147: tathāhi sarvo 'pi vyavahartā 'hamatrādhikṛta iti abhimatya mayā etatkartavyamiti adhyavasyati tataśca pravartate /
GSP31tattvmiu:148: tatra citisannidhānādāpannacaitanyāyā buddheryo 'yaṃ kartavyamiti viniśayayaḥ so 'dhyavasāyaḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:153: ahamatra śaktaḥ matto nānyo 'trādhikṛtaḥ ato 'hamasmi ityādiko yo 'bhimānaḥ so 'haṅkāravyāpāratvādahaṅkāraḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:154: tamupajīvya hi buddhiradhyavasyati karttavyametanmayeti ahaṅkārācca dvividhaḥ sargaḥ sāttvikādekādaśendriyāṇi tāmasāttu pañcatanmātrāḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:162: paścācca vastudhamairjātyādibhiryo 'dhyavasāyaḥ sa saṅkalpākhyo manaso vyāpāraḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:163: ekasmādahaṅkārādekādaśavidhāni indriyāṇi bhavantītyatra tu śabdādyupabhogasampravartakādṛṣṭabheda eva niyāmakaḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:165: pañcabuddhīndriyāṇāṃ sambaddhavastvālocanaṃ vṛttiḥ vāgādikarmendriyāṇāṃ tu vacanādayo vṛttayaḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:166: evaṃ mahato 'dhyavasāyaḥ ahaṅkārasyābhimānaḥ saṅkalpo manaso vṛttirvyāpāraḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:168: yathāhi parāvaskandāya pravṛttāḥ śāktīkayāṣṭīkādayaḥ svaṃ svaṃ śaktyādikamevādadate na parasparayaṣṭyādikam /
GSP31tattvmiu:169: nanu yāṣṭīkānāṃ cetanatvādastu tathā pravṛttiḥ karaṇānāṃ tvacetanānāṃ pravṛtterayuktatvāttatsvarūpasāmarthyopabhogābhijña
GSP31tattvmiu:170: adhiṣṭhātā svīkārya iti cenna tatpravṛttau puruṣārthasya hetutvāt etaccopapādayiṣyati /
GSP31tattvmiu:172: karaṇatvaṃ tu śabdasparśādiprakāśanaṃ karmendriyāṇāṃ tu vacanādivyāpāraḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:174: nadīpūrabhedādabhūdvṛṣṭiḥ asti dhūmādihāgniḥ pipīlikāṇḍasaṃcaraṇādbhaviṣyati vṛṣṭiriti pratyayāt /
GSP31tattvmiu:176: tanmate 'pyatītānāgatādivyavahārabhedaḥ upādhibhedādeva bhavati evaṃ ca taistairupādhibhirevātītānāgatādibhedasiddhau kimatiriktakālasvīkāreṇeti sāṃkhyāḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:178: yathāhi grāmādhyakṣā karṣakādibhyaḥ karamādāya viṣayādhyakṣāya prayacchanti viṣayādhyakṣaśca
GSP31tattvmiu:179: sarvādhyakṣāya sa ca bhūpataye evaṃ bāhyendriyāṇyālocya manase samarpayanti manaśca
GSP31tattvmiu:181: ete ca buddhīndriyamanohaṅkārā guṇaviśeṣā guṇānāṃ sattvarajastamasāṃ vikārāḥ parasparaṃ
GSP31tattvmiu:182: viruddhāṃ api puruṣārthenaikavākyatāpannāḥ yathā santamasāpanayanena prakāśāya militā
GSP31tattvmiu:184: nanu kasmādbuddhau prayacchanti na punarahaṅkārāya manase veti cenna puruṣārthasya prayojakatayā sākṣātsādhanaṃ pradhānaṃ buddhireva ahaṅkārādayastu taṃ prati gauṇāḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:185: asmadādibhiḥ parasparavyāvṛttāni nānubhūyante iti śabdāditanmātrāṇi aviśeṣāḥ sūkṣmāṇi ca /
GSP31tattvmiu:186: ākāśādiṣu tu sthūleṣu kvacitsattvapradhānatayā śāntāḥ sukhāḥ prasannā laghavaḥ kecidrajastamaḥpradhānatayā ghorā mūḍhāśca /
GSP31tattvmiu:187: te viśeṣāḥ punaḥ tridhā sūkṣmaṃ śarīraṃ mātāpitṛjaṃ mahābhūtāni ca /
GSP31tattvmiu:190: etacca śarīraṃ bhogānarha iti sthūlaṃ śarīraṃ ṣāṭkauśikamāśrayati /
GSP31tattvmiu:191: lomalohitamāṃsāni mātṛtaḥ snāyvasthimajjānaḥ pitṛta iti ṣaṭ kośāḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:192: nanu dharmādharmanimittaḥ saṃsāraḥ tasya ca sūkṣmaśarīre 'bhāvātkathaṃ sthūlaśarīrāśrayaṇamiti
GSP31tattvmiu:193: cet na dharmādyanvitabuddhyā saṃyogena tasyāpi dharmādyabhivāsitatvāt yathāhi surabhipuṣpādisambandhādvastramapi
GSP31tattvmiu:195: dharmādharmādinimittakaṃ ca sthūlaśarīragrahaṇaṃ tayoḥ saṃsargeṇa sūkṣmaśarīraṃ sthūlaśarīramāśritya devo vā manuṣyo vā paśurvā bhavati /
GSP31tattvmiu:196: yathāhi naṭastāṃ bhūmikāma vidhāya dharmarājo vā bhavati vatsarājo vā bhavati iti /
GSP31tattvmiu:201: tattvānabhijñasya puruṣasya vairāgyamātrātprakṛtyādiṣvātmabudhyopāsyamāneṣu tatraiva layaḥ rāgātsaṃsāraḥ aiśvaryādicchāyā avighātaḥ vighātaścānaiśvaryāt
GSP31tattvmiu:210: tuṣṭayo dvedhā ādhyātmikā bāhyāśca prakṛtivyatirikta ātmāstīti niścitya saṃnyāsādeva
GSP31tattvmiu:211: tavāpavarto bhaviṣyatīti upadeśādau yā tuṣṭayastā ādhyātmikyaḥ pañcaviṣayoparamāt
GSP31tattvmiu:217: nanu sukhaduḥkhādayaḥ prākṛtā buddhiguṇāḥ kathaṃ cetane bhavantīti cetsatyam puri liṅge śerate sa puruṣaḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:221: niṣkāraṇatve tu sadaiva syānnaiva vā syāt /
GSP31tattvmiu:225: nanu prakṛteḥ kartṛtve tasyā nityatvenānuparamātkadāpi mokṣo na syāditi cenna /
GSP31tattvmiu:226: yathā hi odanakāmaḥ pakvaudano na pravartate punastatra evaṃ yaṃ yaṃ puruṣaṃ prakṛtirmocitavatī na taṃ prati punaḥ pravartate /
GSP31tattvmiu:227: nanvacetanāyāṃ prakṛtau kathaṃ cetanadharmaḥ pravṛttiḥ tasmādasti prakṛteradhiṣṭhātā
GSP31tattvmiu:229: prakṛteradhiṣṭhātā sa ceśvara eveti cetsatyam yathāhi vatvavivṛddhyarthamacetanamapi
GSP31tattvmiu:230: kṣīraṃ pravartate tathā prakṛtirapi puruṣamokṣāya pravartiṣyate /
GSP31tattvmiu:232: dvidhā hi pravṛttirbhavati svārthāya kāruṇyāya vā /
GSP31tattvmiu:233: na cāptasakalakāmasyeśvarasya kimapi prārthanīyamasti sargātprāk duḥkhābhāvena karuṇāyā asaṃbhavāt /
GSP31tattvmiu:234: kiñca karuṇayā prerita īśvaraḥ sukhina eva sarvān prāṇinaḥ sṛjet na vicitrān /
GSP31tattvmiu:235: prakṛtestvacetanatayā nedaṃ dvayaṃ kintu parārthaiva pravṛttiḥ yathā pāriṣadānpradarśayannivartate naṭaḥ evaṃ prakṛtiḥ ātmānaṃ śabdādyātmanā puruṣādbhedena prakāśya nivartate /
GSP31tattvmiu:236: phalābhāve 'pi nirguṇe upakāriṇyapi puruṣe prakṛtistapasvinī pravartate eva yathāhi guṇavānupakāryapi bhṛtyo nirguṇe upakāriṇyapi svāmini niṣphalārādhanaḥ
GSP31tattvmiu:237: yadyapi nāṭyānnivṛtto 'pi naṭaḥ kālāntare punarapi pravartate evaṃ muktaṃ prati prakṛtistu
GSP31tattvmiu:238: na punaḥ pravartate yathāhi vigalitavasanā kulavadhūḥ kadācitkenaciddṛṣṭā cettadāsau
GSP31tattvmiu:239: tathā yatate yathā na puruṣāntarāṇi paśyanti evaṃ prakṛtirapi vivekena sākṣātkṛtā
GSP31tattvmiu:241: nanu savāsanakleśakarmāśayānāṃ bandhanasaṃjñitānāmapyapariṇāmini puruṣe 'sambhavātkathaṃ mokṣaḥ mucerbandhanaviśleṣārthatvāt /
GSP31tattvmiu:242: ata eva na saṃsāro 'pi sambhavati niṣkriyatvāt /
GSP31tattvmiu:244: yathāhi bhṛtyagatau jayaparājayau svāminyupacaryete evaṃ prakṛtigatayorapi bhogāpavargayorvivekāgrahātpuruṣe upacāraḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:246: evaṃ ca kṛtādasmāttattvābhyāsānnāsmi na me nāhamiti śuddhamutpadyate jñānaṃ yadviṣayo abhyāsastaṃ sākṣātkārayatīti /
GSP31tattvmiu:248: nāhamityanena kartṛtvaṃ na me ityanena svāmitvaṃ niṣidhyate /
GSP31tattvmiu:249: bhogavivekasākṣātkārau prakṛteḥ prasotavyau tau ca prasūtāviti nivṛttā prakṛtistāṃ
GSP31tattvmiu:252: ante tattvajñānasya tadānīmeva śarīrapātastu na bhavati /
GSP31tattvmiu:253: yathāhi nivṛtte kulālavyāpāre saṃskāravaśāt cakraṃ bhramattiṣṭhati evaṃ saṃskāravaśāt
GSP31tattvmiu:254: śarīramapi śarīrapātānantaraṃ tu pradhānasya nivṛttatvādātyantikamapi duḥkhaṃ naśyati
